thread.title: Watch the Stranger Things Season Two Trailer - Eleven Is Alive
thread.title_full: Watch the Stranger Things Season Two Trailer - Eleven Is Alive

author: Matt Miller
title: Watch the Stranger Things Season Two Trailer - Eleven Is Alive
text:
The Stranger Things Season 2 Trailer Has Some Very Good News for Fans 
Guess who's back? By Matt Miller Feb 5, 2017 Oh man, the nostalgia starts right away in the Stranger Things season two trailer with a throwback to an old Eggo commercialâ€”the show's preferred frozen waffle company. We also see the gang in Ghostbusters jumpsuits. Most important, though, Eleven is back. The new trailer, which debuted during the Super Bowl, revealed that Eleven is alive, even though her fate was left as a cliffhanger at the end of season one. Advertisement - Continue Reading Below Most Popular Beyond the few brief glimpses of the team, the trailer announced that the second season will debut on Halloween. So much for going out that night.
